website_summaries.verdict: This highly adjustable clamp-mounted swing arm lamp is perfect if you need to save on desk space.
pros: just clamp this lamp to your desk and away you go
Offers a large light area and is highly adjustable
The twin arm can extend to 32 inches
The 59-inch cable should provide plenty of slack
cons: Some users report having trouble finding the balancing point of the lamp

customer_reviews.title: Slips upright, will not stay in position.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this lamp and it does not stay in position. It keeps slipping to a fully upright position and tends to stay that way. You can't get it to stay in any other position. I thought the directions may have an answer, but it only tells you how to tighten the screws. This doesn't help the upright slippage issue. This is another example of why I dislike buying so many products online. At least in the store you can put your hands on things to judge whether or not you really are getting what you're paying for. This will be going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnna Bass

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, hip, modern, does its job
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased worse versions of this same concept in the past (clip on desk lamp), and this one has put them to shame. When you adjust the angle, it stays. When you press the switch on, it doesn't flicker. When you accidentally swivel-smash it against a bookshelf, the paint doesn't chip. I like it! It also looks very nice and doesn't take up any space on a small crowded desk. I do wish the base was made of something other than black plastic, not because it's provided any functional issue but because it's not as pretty as metal would be. Or wood! The hipster add-ons are limitless.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It comes with two mounts which is not explained in the directions which are pretty useless, but make for entertaining reading
customer_reviews.text: The unit feels solid, the joints are tight and the springs hold the position as they should. It comes with two mounts which is not explained in the directions which are pretty useless, but make for entertaining reading. Sp even though there are two mounts, neither holds well. The one with the screw is the tighter of the two. The lamp fell of the desk twice. I'll have to screw the top of the mount into the wood and hopefully that'll keep it secure. I'd give this five stars if at least one of the mounts was more robust.
customer_reviews.author: elf

customer_reviews.title: Excellentl in every way
customer_reviews.text: East to mount, sturdy when mounted, willing to adjust to suit you -- highly recommended. The light gray tint inside th shade averts the glare you'll sometimes find,with white ones. Perfect lighting for any close work. Highly recommended. I would like to thank the reviewers who led me to this satisfying choice.
customer_reviews.author: Still St. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in position.
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay in position. Wish I had bought something different.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Would not stay in position
customer_reviews.text: Fixing up a man-cave workshop in my basement and needed some additional lighting over the work area. The price and length of this lamp looked ideal, and it could be clamped to the workbench or wall thus freeing up space made it a no-brainer. The lamp was a really nice gun metal grey colour, which would blend in with most rooms, but despite locking down the tightening screws, the lamp would not stay in position, and kept slipping upright., So trying to use it to provide localised lights across a workbench was not successful, hence 2* and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: wattsie

customer_reviews.title: Was so impressed I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of this for my worktable 2 years ago. I recently decided to purchase another as a reading light. I initially bought another brand and trust me, saving 10 dollars simply isn't worth it. I returned it immediately and bought another ToJane. The fit, finish and function is simply worlds better than anything else I have found. Set up is quick and easy, and the inclusion of 2 different bases is a nice touch. I doubt I will ever need another one, but if I do, I am not going to ass about with any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving my lamp. I was afraid it wouldn't be bright enough but it's perfect. Also, it's firm and well made. The clamp is not bulky and doesn't take much space (unlike my previous one). Funny thing is I was under the impression that there would be 2 bulbs in the box (because the description said 'extra free light bulb'), but there was only one bulb and TWO different clamps (again, the description only mentions one clamp). Anyway, that's not a problem, but maybe they should fix the description.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work and crafting
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, I clamp it to the end of my L-shaped desk and can maneuver it however I need it while it stays out of my way. I will be getting more for our nightstands, it has a comforting but bright light, and the button switch on the cord is handy so I don't have to worry about my little burning her hands on the lightbulb cover trying to twist any difficult switches.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I just moved and was counting on this lamp for some light in my dark room. It came but missing the essential springs for installation and now I have to return the item and get another lamp. Was really inconvenienced. Seller and manufacturer should ensure all the parts are in the box.:(
customer_reviews.author: Y K.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY WORTH THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned numerous of these "clamp lights" throughout the years. Some didn't hold their position, and the CLAMP on every single one of them BROKE. This one is more expensive but DEFINITELY worth it. It is very well made, holds it's position exactly, and VERY IMPORTANT, comes with a very Heavy Duty Clamp, PLUS an EXTRA Clamp just in case. The EXTRA clamp supplied would also fit on a very thick desktop. I am very happy with this product. It does come with a supplied LED bulb, if you want it brighter, or warmer K temperature light, then just replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality swing arm lamp
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything but the base - in the old days they had screw holes - this one has two notches (I bought it to mount on a painting easel) it worked okay but would have preferred holes (couldn't tell for sure it looked like it had them) for secure mounting. The plastic elbow tightening screw does not have much room between tight and loose. It does the job and is attractive. LED bulb pokes beyond the shade a little which isn't perfect for easels but fine for most purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Terrano

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp with some trouble shooting.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second I've ordered. The first was very easy to set up. This one the knob was really tight and so were the springs that left it bouncing back to it's original position. After using ape strength to loosen the knob, he then stretched the springs by pulling on one with each hand in different directions. That did the trick. Otherwise it is a good lamp with a practical clamp setup on either a table or a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Alumwhistle

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build that will last for years
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality product. Every part is solid and works perfection. Build seems that it will last for many years. The only suggestion I have for the seller is that the bulb included is a bit too white--the cool white--for me. Yet the fact that they include a bulb is already generous, and it is just a personal preference for light color. If you are browsing this review to decide on your purchase of this lamp, don't steer away because this is truly a great lamp. I strongly recommend it and am even considering buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Walice F.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is used in an art room to provide additional light on art projects. The lamp was very well packed to prevent possible damage. When I unpacked the lamp 2 of the springs were off (possibly intentionally), but I was able to reattach them with little effort. I was a little confused that I received 2 mounts, but appreciate being able to have mounts in two separate locations so that I can move the lamp easily and according to my needs. Finally, the maneuverability of the lamp is very impressive. You adjust it to a specific position and it just stays... no sinking over time or relaxing. It stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: Dagusia

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I clamped this guy on my drafting table. Since the table is on an incline a regular lamp wouldn't work. This thing is great and takes up about a two square inches (maybe) of the surface on my desk. Great since the desk space is needed for drawing. The chord was a little shorter than I would have liked but I think that's a bit of a silly complaint so I didn't feel it warranted a decrease in stars. I just plugged it into an extension that I already had at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Snarr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I love them. I love the color and the style. I also love that the switch is located on the cord instead of above the bulb housing. I replaced the bulbs that were included with higher quality bulbs. Wish the lamps were about 10 bucks cheaper, but still happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Claude Van Darn

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp on March 6 so I've owned it for 4 months. The lamp perfectly suit my needs. However, yesterday the lamp almost caught fire. It seemed to be running hotter than it should, and then last night I smelled an electrical fire smell so I immediately unplugged it and took out the light bulb. After changing the bulb and waiting several hours, I turned it back on and within 10 minutes, the electrical fire smell started again. So I give this product 1 star because I think it is dangerous. Thank God I was sitting at my desk and noticed the smell or it could have burned down my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lamp for two years and use it every day on my desk. I love it and it's perfect for my use. Easy to mount and easily movable. and it stays in place. The light is just right ... no glare. To me, the only drawback is that the switch is on the cord rather than up above. I have to stand up and lean over to reach it, but that may not be a problem for others. I highly recommend this lamp ... and may order another. A+
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Premium Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice light. It's a bit more expensive than some of the others listed, but I think it's worth a premium price. Tightly made, great finish. My last light failed when the peg that slides into the desk mounting bracket snapped off. (It's the peg that gets the stress when the light position is adjusted.) That peg was plastic. This is metal. All the hinges are metal. I expect this light to hold-up well...and it looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: MarkAMik

customer_reviews.title: Versatile lighting option
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use in my photography studio over both the mat cutting area and the photo mounting area. The two areas are adjacent and this lamp just swings back and forth so I don't need two lights. This is a great light when the need is for a larger area to be illuminated and the length of its swing arm is perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA J. TODD

customer_reviews.title: Great for sewing machine or craft table
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of attaching this light to any table. I have the one that clips to my craft / sewing machine table and when my husband saw it he had me ordered one for his work shop. He loves how easy it is to shine the light right where he needs it. Also it uses lightbulbs 💡 so you don’t have to go crazy trying to find that special bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: but it's worked out fine. A very minor complaint is that the vise ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my work bench that I use for minor gunsmithing work and cleaning guns. When unpacking it didn't look all that robust, but it's worked out fine. A very minor complaint is that the vise clamp for clamping it to a table or bench top is plastic and doesn't look all that strong. I didn't use this though, I mounted mine on the frame of the bench using the four screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: Donn W Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for sewing machine lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price for such a nice lamp. I have tried others and they didn't have enough range of motion to use on my sewing machine table. I have a Juki-8700 industrial and this was easy to attach to the table and plugs in to turn on/off with the machine. I can swing it all the way around to thread my needle if needed. I did not receive the color I ordered but it is so great, I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Little LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Great First Impression.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp based specifically on the high reviews. There are certainly many cheaper out there. It came with two clamps, one multi-mount and one straight clamp. The included LED bulb is indeed bright white and does not interfere with the radios on my shack. It is light weight, an easy install, flexible both above and below it's mount point. I have it clamped to a shelf above the workstation and pulled down for use. I do find the switch in the cord a little strange and may change out the socket for one with a built in rotary switch. Depends a lot on how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: ham_n_bill

customer_reviews.title: Good size, natural lighting, great for art
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Basic desk lamp with a very sturdy arm and base. Bright natural lighting. The only downside is the lamp literally only works with the type of bulb it comes with and no other. So hopefully it's not too difficult to find a replacement once it burns out but all around I love the lamp and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: smash

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I was looking for! I’m a quilter and have knocked several lamps off my sewing table! This lamp not only clamps securely to my sewing table, I can position it so I have light exactly where I need it. There was an additional clamp included, that I assume could be used on a thicker edge.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Won't work where I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.text: The range of motion for this light is incredibly limited. On top of that, the tighteners you use to lock the light in place were completely ineffective. I tried to lock the arm in place only to have it return to its starting position. I've already set this item up to be returned, and am instead using one that's half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron N. Kirzner

customer_reviews.title: I didn't receive a bulb
customer_reviews.text: This may indeed be a fantastic lamp but I won't know until I spend the money and order a bulb do use with it. My wife and I tore the stuffings out of the box and could not find any type of bulb. And with a base the size of E26 or E27 it should be easy to find. I'll upgrade the rating if it really is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Rick in Ft. Worth

customer_reviews.title: Love my ToJane 32"
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and well made. I've worked with these swing arms of different makes and models for years in drafting. This one is good quality, like the gray color and easy to set up. If you treat it with respect it will last forever. Like any equipment, if you get rough with it, it with not last. I took notes off another review on where to get replacement spring for it if needed. Lowes has them cheaper then from the maker of the light. I've used it for my giant sewing table for 3 weeks now and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp although I wish it was brighter or at least that the brightness was adjustable. The only major issue was setting it up; I'm pretty good at assembling/constructing things but while handling the spring I got an extremely painful injury - a chunk of skin taken out of my hand, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian1234567

customer_reviews.title: Good swing, dark, small shade
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the rather small bell is a dark, flat gray... you can see where that goes. Or perhaps you won't be able to. ;-) The shade came with a small pinhole. ??? Motion is good, clamps are fine. Will probably use this as a secondary lamp on my bench ... while I wait for a different lamp to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: MeteorMagnet

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY PERFECT xcept white is not white!
customer_reviews.text: This lit'l lamp fits perfectly in my end of kitchen counter docking station/mini office area. While not heavy duty n commercial like, it is well constructed n totally flexible. There's even an LED bulb included for goodness sake, as well as 2 different type clamps. Although I would have preferred bright white, the white is actually cream; it still blends nicely with my blk n white kitchn w/ marble counters. ANOTHER GREAT HAPPEE PURCHASE; LuvLuv!!!
customer_reviews.author: wrknetSanFran

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first, but wow
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase, I was looking for a good study table lamp but didn’t want to settle with the traditional “table lamp or led lamp” that I commonly in the market in these days. This lamp looks is perfect, design and practicality. It’s very sturdy, made of metal, comes with a light bulb that’s less hassle already! And most of all it matches my new MacBook Pro 2018. If you want a sophisticated loOk for your office or table, get this one, you won’t regret!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned because of smell
customer_reviews.text: Returned this because of a horrible chemical smell. Tried to live with it for several days but finally said, "enough."
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's craft table. What a great lamp. high quality, and secures to the desk easily. The arm is very movable but secure so you can adjust the lamp to several spots and get focused light on what you want. Comes with a LED bulb but you can change it out and go up to 200 watts of equivalent light. We put in a LED that was equivalent to 100 watt incandescent bulb and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth Movement, Well Made Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was well made, so I bought this based on the positive reviews, even though there were less expensive options. I am pleased with my decision. Two clamping options, perfect LED bulb for my application included in the package. The swing arm has a great range of motion and moves very smoothly. Much better than the crappy plastic one I replaced. Frankly, I would prefer the control switch to be mounted on the lamp shade itself or in that area, rather than the cord, but I really can't find any other complaints about this product. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp for my cramped desk.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this lamp. I have lots of stuff I need to keep on my desk so space really limited. Being able to have this attached to the side instead of a big base cluttering up space is perfect. I love the dark grey, too. Goes great with the rest of my office decor (white and grey).
customer_reviews.author: SaraN

customer_reviews.title: One good, one bad
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look great. I use my own LED bulbs so I can't speak to the included bulbs. I bought one a while back and it works great. The 2nd one I bought -- the joints are all a bit loose and it tends to swing, slowly. I'll have to get some tools and try tightening it. Given its price relative to similar items, I'd expect better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp; it is exactly what I was looking for. I can swing the light over the entire desk. I have a L-shape desk and the lamp reaches over the entire desk surface. My laptop is on the left and my drawing board is in front and to the right. I tried more than one lamp before getting this one. I am totally satisfied with this lamp. Also, shipping was great! Received it as promised and the packaging protected my lamp. I must admit, Amazon.com impresses me! They always have what I'm looking for, prices are good (even the best a lot of the time), delivery is great; Amazon.com even makes it easy to return an item.
customer_reviews.author: Persistent

customer_reviews.title: Great but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Lighter build than the one it replaced. Granted that one was 20 years old and built like a tank. Having said that, I do like the lighter weight on my drawing board. The only complaint is that the on/off switch is on the cord, not the light. Thought that was a strange design. It does make it a bit awkward to turn the light on and off. Not that big enough of a problem to give the light less than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JonH

customer_reviews.title: Truly articulating - shines brighty from all angles!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right lamp for my purposes. I am a wood carver; I make hand carved signs, so when I'm working on a project I need a truly articulating light that can illuminate my project from every angle as I work around it. This lamp does just that. I can get it right down to eye level! I moves smoothly and then stays right where I put it, no drooping down over time. I am very pleased with the ToJane light and would't hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp--looks a lot more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. I have several Luxo lamps that cost hundreds of dollars each, and this lamp reminds me of those--all metal and easily adjustable. It comes with two kinds of clamps. The one I'm using, which attaches the lamp to a bookshelf, is also all-metal and sleek looking. Really good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: These are not at all adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. The dial that is meant to tighten arms of light into position, don't move, so the light is either totally collapsed, or a straight line outwards. Anyone who purchases these lights will want them to adjust -- that's the whole point -- and these don't. It makes me angry that someone would make something so lame. Don't buy! A rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, ok quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like th design and shape of the lamp. The lighting is good. Only a 3 star because I ordered 2 and one of them did not work at all right out of the box. Also the clamps are very similar in thickness. Was hoping one of the 2 clamps would work on a thinker table or side of bed, like a 4 inch clamp or such. Not 2 clamps that each look different, but both only go about 2 inches wide, little redundant.
customer_reviews.author: Lud

customer_reviews.title: Decent inexpensive lamp
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Looks just like the picture. I turn it off anytime I leave the room because some of the reviews I have seen describe it as a fire risk, but I have seen no evidence for that myself. Construction is decent. I had to tighten all the screws when I unboxed it. A little on the pricey side for what it is, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LSC

customer_reviews.title: very bright and adjustable...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't dislike anything about this light...well maybe my only dislike is that it was made in china...other then that I couldn't ask for anything better...the only reason I give it 4 stars and not 5 is because it was made in china...but other then that I love it...
customer_reviews.author: rod bookout

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly like needed
customer_reviews.text: There were many flexible desk lamps to choose from, it was confusing there were so many.. My intended use was on a work bench where I could aim the light precisely at detailed work in about any direction. I chose this one and it works great. The clamp opens far enough to work on 2x6” lumber. I would recommend to a good friend.
customer_reviews.author: John Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, quality build, very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. It came with two types of clamps depending on your surface I guess. Clamps onto the edge of my desk so it takes up almost zero space. I do a lot of work on computers and other electronics so being able to move this around to any position I need is the best. Quality seems good, almost all metal parts and nothing seems cheap or fragile. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A proper desk lamp for work or study
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase of this lamp! The range of motion on this lamp is really nice and it provides enough brightness without being overpowering as the shade directs the light well. I do notice a clicking noise occasionally when I maneuver the lamp at certain angles, which I haven't been able to find out the cause of yet but it does not seem to impact the functionality of the lamp. The construction of this lamp is sturdy and well put together. I have not had the joints give out on me like previous lamps have.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rappard

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a good replacement lamp. Since it affixes to the table, it could be a few inches longer for my over-sized table. It seems well made and easily adjusts. My only complaint is the location of the on/off switch at the base of the lamp which was difficult to reach and didn't work for me. I replaced the light socket with an rear switch socket and I am now a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: tennis_nut-7

customer_reviews.title: Would like the mount to be a little more substantial
customer_reviews.text: The lamp appears to be well made and certainly has the brightness I was looking for. My only comment is about the friction screw in the mount. It was apparently stripped somewhere in the manufacturing process. The hole was oversized ... and the screw would not grip and fell out. Would like the mount to be a little more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: The base bends as well as the elbow on this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the neck swings down at the base. I needed this on my drafting table and most of these swing lamps cannot do this. And it's longer than most arms on these types of lamps. The only thing is that using a 100W equivalent LED bulb means that the bulb protrudes from the shade and can be annoying to look at because it's so bright.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Barr

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Burning Smell When Turned On
customer_reviews.text: This lamp would've been perfect if it doesn't smell like it could explode at any minute. Each time I've turned it on, there is a toxic smelling stench that fills the air. I can't imagine this is healthy. Would not recommend. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: VD

customer_reviews.title: This lamp does not stay in certain set position.
customer_reviews.text: The springs are too stiff, in certain positions the lamp moves from its set position. The head of the lamp also droops occasionally. I did try to tighten the screws but it did not help. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sumukh

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp, plastic base seems cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lamp that includes the LED bulb. The clamp on plastic base is the weakest link, as it deflects when the lamp is moved. I do find myself reaching to the head of the lamp when I want to turn it on / off rather than finding the switch on the cord, but not a big issue. The lamp itself is well made and I am happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett E C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold position
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay in position. No matter how tight I made the screws, it sags down. Wouldn't recommend, you will be having to readjust it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking if a bit prosaic
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking if a bit prosaic. Delivery was delayed due to UPS -- the extra early delivery charge was simply wasted as it was not delivered on time, but 2 days later than agreed. The bulbs are way too blue, but are as described, so i traded them for that I had in other locations in my house. The lamps are sturdy, and should work well.
customer_reviews.author: Not easy to please BUT CAN BE PLEASED

customer_reviews.title: The arm won't stay in position
customer_reviews.text: For having joints, it would be nice if the lamp would not extend itself upward all the way regardless of how tight the screws are.
customer_reviews.author: Avtvty

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised, a good, solid product. However, I could not find where it was made until it arrived in a box labelled Made in China. This designation seems to be removed from many online descriptions. I'm looking for Made in USA products.
customer_reviews.author: John B Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Springs flew off
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for asking. I’m actually returning the item. The second time I turned it 2 of the springs flew off, I found one the other I have not find it yet. The bulb light didn’t turned on, but the light does work, I tried with another bulb light. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NEO

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product spec, only 1.49 inch table thickness.
customer_reviews.text: The product description is inaccurate. The C-Clamp thickness on Amazon's description states "C-Clamp thickness 2.16inch" but when the product arrived, the manual states 3.8cm (1.49 inches). Light seems nice and has a decent paint coating, but i wasn't able to use the light. I ended up returning the light.
customer_reviews.author: MrrQuackers

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is really nice, and it always holds it position
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is really nice, and it always holds it position. I especially love the color and the placement of the on/off switch. The only thing I did not like was the bulb that came with it. It is a very bluish, cold light, kind of an eyesore. I've replaced the bulb with a warmer one and now it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: melanie horton

customer_reviews.title: White is not white at all, pic is deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: My only real complaint is that the lamp is an off-white, it's not a true white color at all, not even close really, so it doesn't match my white Ikea desk and Kallax as I had hoped. It doesn't match the photo at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hof

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good buy for the money. I ordered white and was a bit disappointed that it was more off white than expected. Also received an extra clamp that seems to go with another style lamp. But it will do what I want.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing but lighting is so far fine.
customer_reviews.text: The springs will not hold the range of motion unless you extend the bottom springs to the top height of the assemble. I've never written a bad review in my life but I paid $40 for something I had to manipulate in order for it to work properly. The actual lighting so far seems to be fine. This is a $20-$25 lamp at best.
customer_reviews.author: Shenandoah Tillett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend so she can see colors more accurately when she's making art. Not only is the light output about as close to perfect white as it could matter, but it's also much brighter than I expected with the stock LED bulb. The build quality is great, and the adjustability is fantastically useful.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: functional design
customer_reviews.text: The product is well designed and works as intended. I was more concerned about the width of the table clip tool but that was also the way it was described and I had no problem installing it. Everything feels smooth but nothing is loose. keeps itself in place at any position.
customer_reviews.author: behshad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. This lamp is attractive, very well made, and was easy to assemble. I use it at my computer table, and it is tall enough to rise above my monitor. It is adjustable to quite a few different positions. It was packaged extremely well and arrived in perfect condition. They even included a light bulb, which was a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fries your light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my plants and was using it with full spectrum light bulbs. It was good for about nine months. Then, it started frying every single light bulb I put in it. For full spectrum light bulbs at $15 a pop, I was really frustrated after going through for bulbs. It's too bad, because the functionality of the lamp is really nice. If it actually stayed in working order, I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Full Flexibility, Great for a Gaming Setup
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Comes with two different clamp variants - Sturdy design, no cheap plastic - FULLY flexible arms and lamp swivel to direct the light exactly where you want it - Good source of light, able to hold up to a 40W LED bulb Cons: - None yet. I decided to clamp this on to my dual monitor stand which is also clamped to my desk and it has yet to faulter. If I bump my desk a little it barely moves. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: At more than twice the price of simialar lamps, it must be good - It is!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very versatile. It moves to where you want it effortlessly and unlike many similar lamps, stays where you put it. Feels high quality. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hidden

customer_reviews.title: Smoked with a terrible smell after two years of use
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this lamp for a little more than two years. Then it started to smoke and the bulb in it fell apart. Thinking the problem was with the bulb, I replaced it. After one more day of use, the lamp started to smoke again. Destroyed the bulb. Not trying again.
customer_reviews.author: JFE2201

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: excellent for my craft room where I use it to read, or to provide spot lighting for photography, or to get a close look at something I'm working on. Works great. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: duitsvno

customer_reviews.title: Pretty crappy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so hard to adjust and it either falls in your face or springs up. We waited too late to return it so we're trying to make it work. Don't buy this unless you want to be frustrated and out $40.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley B. Hise

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money at all. The lamp doesn’t stay up, I position it and a second later right back down which means it’s useless since I wanted it for my desk to paint.
customer_reviews.author: luz lee

customer_reviews.title: Will work
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product is good. Only problem I encountered was the power cable was about a few inches short. Not the product's problem but because of my placement.
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp! Looks super cute
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! Looks super cute. Made super well. I had a previous drafting lamp that kept slowly falling apart.... this one seems much more together... with extra springs and bolts keeping everything secure. If you are actually using this lamp for drafting or art though.... you may want to paint the interior white and use a much higher wattage bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but kinda pricey
customer_reviews.text: You can only attach to level surfaces and the lamp must be mounted with the clamp facing upwards. No sideways clamping as there is not enough friction to keep the clamp in place. Be warned the included lightbulb is a daylight (white light) light bulb. The box says E27 lightbulb but you can use a standard A19 lightbulb it will definitely fit.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. Less than great bulb.
customer_reviews.text: This little desk lamp is actually extremely helpful for my art. At the right angle is completely eliminates shadows cast by my hand in my viewing area. However, I've only had it for about two months, and the light has already began to dim, not much, but a bit. I've used it for about thirty hours total the past two months.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Cox-Wohner

customer_reviews.title: Functional and stylish
customer_reviews.text: The long adjustable swing arm is great. It keeps everything out of the way while providing good light. The bulb it came with was a little too "cool/blue" for my taste, but I had an extra warm LED to swap in.
customer_reviews.author: B Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Materials, finish and construction are a step above.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this lamp is a step above the other inexpensive ones. The materials, finish and construction are a step above. They have included a metal table clamp, I love this. Also included is a light bulb, although I did not use this bulb. I have only one criticism, I wish the on/off switch was on the top of the lamp instead of the cord. I normally clamp these lamps to the far end of a table. The cable runs down the back of the table and the switch is not convenient to operate. I understood this was the design when purchasing the product so I cannot dock them a star.
customer_reviews.author: Deepsquid

customer_reviews.title: Our patio room table is a good place to grow plants but there are a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lamp holder with enough reach to use with Morsen 50W LED Grow Light Bulb. Our patio room table is a good place to grow plants but there are a lot of days the plants need more light so this completes out ability to grow garden plants - - and herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Good light source
customer_reviews.text: I was having an ok size with shadows due to light source direction. This unit solved that problem completely. The unit came with a bulb!and
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality light!
customer_reviews.text: Great work table lamp! Comes with two clamps to choose from for mounting. It also comes with a 6000k color temp.(daylight) bulb. The adjustable arms are excellent, and the on/off switch located on the cable is nice and convenient. Highly recommend this light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For its class (swing arm model w/ standard A19 bulb), it's the best. It uses damn near any bulb you find in store that screws into the fixture, unless you're trying to use it with those 200w floodlights. Mine came with a plastic clamp (shown in product picture), and a seperate metal one in the same box. I thought I only got 1.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure
customer_reviews.text: So I do not know how often you get what is actually advertised on amazon and how often you get a Chinese knock off but I have had no problems with the clamp at all and these lamps have good range of motion. I didn't rate the brightness because I bought daylight bulbs for them.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: My wife sews, and she needed more light on ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife sews, and she needed more light on her work table. We'd thought about some sort of a ceiling light, but we tried this lamp, and it solved the problem perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Renz

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this lamp
customer_reviews.text: When I first unboxed the lamp, I was concerned that it wasn't going to work for my situation, that the extension frame was going to be too short. However, I managed to mount it so that the lamp can be lifted or lowered between my monitors. The lamp lights up my work surface very well. It is not hot to the touch and the bulb that came with the lamp provides plenty of illumination.
customer_reviews.author: Loren T. Grummons

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: I bought thinking the quality might be a bit better than run-of-the-mill but it's not - don't be me - buy the less expensive one...
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you don't get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This lamp isn't worth $40 and I wish I'd been more careful when buying it. It's no better built than lamps less than half the price, and the base and clamp are particularly cheap pieces of plastic. That aside, and perhaps more importantly, the inside of the lampshade isn't painted white, which is a waste of light. At this price point, look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that it's great and It does what I needed it to do. There's no purpose in writing a 10 minute dissertation about it...it's a lamp and it gives light. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: The powder coat gray is beautiful. The lamp is stable and plenty bright for Bible study. Super easy to assemble as well. I had noticed that there was a metal fixed clamp available for this lamp at an additional cost that would allow you to mount it to inclined surfaces. They included it with mine for free. That's awesome customer service. I didn't ask for it they just sent it. Great lamp, great company.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This light doesn't provide enough light.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use the light for my hobby and once I assembled the light I noticed it wasn't very bright. It came with a 7 Watt blub and I swapped it with a stronger blub with the same results. I wouldn't recommend this light. It was made well but even if you tried to use it to read it wouldn't be enough light.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Martin

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very confusing ad, one page shows clamp style brace, other page shows screw style brace, actually comes with both.. But only one of the mounts actually works. Otherwise the lamp is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jon T

customer_reviews.title: And it is also cool, so you won't burn yourself as you would ...
customer_reviews.text: I think I read one review stating that the arms will not stay in place. This is not true; there are knobs at the joints to secure the arms in any position. The supplied LED bulb is quite bright and at present I can't see any reason to go to something brighter. And it is also cool, so you won't burn yourself as you would on earlier lamps of this type with incandescent bulbs. Don't see anything amiss with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this lamp. In fact, my husband and I each have one. Priced well. High-quality. Reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: costs a little more than the cheapest lamps, but it makes up for it by offered features. however, the inside of the lamp shade 'could' be painted white to increase light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think about mounting on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but it didnt come with the same support piece as shown in the pictures. I was expecting the support piece with four holes so that I could screw/mount the lamp on the wall. Even in the Q&A section, the seller states that the support piece has 4 holes for wood screws. However, no such piece was included.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Yes and yes!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is almost perfect. The only small flaw is this doesn't stay tight.. but i would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: justagirl

product_meta.title: ToJane Swing Arm Desk Lamp,Architect Table Clamp Mounted Light, Flexible Arm Drawing/Office/Studio Table Lamp,Grey Metal Finish
feature_bullets: ✔ Adjustable: 4 springs balanced long swing arm,also 3 rotatable metal joints,ensure a flexible light direction fits for different needs
✔ Strong construction: 0.6mm thick metal,overall molding tech, finished with 3 times painting&roasting,which make sure sturdy enough for a long lifespan
✔ Space saving: desk lamp with clamp mounted,clip on about 2.5" thickness desk surface, will get a large light area also keep your desk tidy
✔ Easy to assemble: fix the springs and bulb,mounted the clamp well,easy and quick to ready for reading/sewing/drafting/drawing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars631 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
